response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and satisfaction. Given its unique features and high-quality materials, we believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or business. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $15,000. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 15000}
